QuestData.Title: The Purge of Veil Shadar
QuestData.Description: Not all arakkoa are alike.$B$B<Iskar lifts his sleeve to reveal a mangled, useless wing.>$B$BIt is no illusion. They did this to me. Before I was even given a name, I was given a place in society: at the bottom.$B$BWe are many. We make our homes in the places this world has forgotten.$B$BVeil Shadar was such a place, but the Adherents have found it and started a purge. For morale. For fun.$B$BHelp my people escape, and we'll be in your debt.$B$BWhen the sky burns, it pays to have allies in the shadows.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help 8 Arakkoa Outcasts evacuate from Veil Shadar.
QuestData.RewardText: Mark my words, $r: Aruuna and Veil Shadar were only the beginning.
